DataElement.preferredName: Bacterial Artificial Chromosome Reporter Name java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Based upon the natural F plasmid of E. coli.  Inserts up to 300 Kb can be cloned and stably maintained as circular molecules.:A biological material (clone, oligo, etc.) on an array which will report on some biosequence or biosequences. Also refers to any substance that is identifiable by virtue of its radioactive signature, color, or other distinguishing physical property, such as a dye, radioactive isotope, or inert chemical, that is introduced into a biological or mechanical system and can be followed through the course of a process, providing information on the pattern of events in the process or on the redistribution of the parts, elements, or events involved._The words or language units by which a thing is known._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

Concepts.definition: Based upon the natural F plasmid of E. coli.  Inserts up to 300 Kb can be cloned and stably maintained as circular molecules.

A biological material (clone, oligo, etc.) on an array which will report on some biosequence or biosequences. Also refers to any substance that is identifiable by virtue of its radioactive signature, color, or other distinguishing physical property, such as a dye, radioactive isotope, or inert chemical, that is introduced into a biological or mechanical system and can be followed through the course of a process, providing information on the pattern of events in the process or on the redistribution of the parts, elements, or events involved.
